mapper.sql: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY EVENT_DATE DESC, EVENT_STATE DESC, EVENT_NO ASC) RNUM, EVENT_NO, EVENT_TITLE, EVENT_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(EVENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') EVENT_DATE, EVENT_THUMBNAIL, EVENT_STATE FROM (SELECT EVENT_NO, EVENT_TITLE, EVENT_CONTENT, EVENT_DATE, EVENT_THUMBNAIL, CASE WHEN EVENT_GUBUN = '0' THEN '비공개' WHEN EVENT_GUBUN = '1' THEN '공개' ELSE '' END AS EVENT_STATE FROM EVENT)
mapper.select:
WHERE 1 = 1
AND EVENT_STATE = '공개'
AND EVENT_STATE = '비공개'
AND EVENT_NO LIKE '%${keyword}%'
AND EVENT_TITLE LIKE '%${keyword}%'
SELECT EVENT_NO, TODAY FROM (SELECT NVL(MAX(EVENT_NO),1)+1 EVENT_NO FROM EVENT) a, (SELECT TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') TODAY FROM DUAL) b
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EVENT (EVENT_NO, EVENT_GUBUN, EVENT_TITLE, EVENT_CONTENT, EVENT_DATE, EVENT_THUMBNAIL) VALUES (#{EVENT_NO}, #{EVENT_GUBUN}, #{EVENT_TITLE}, #{EVENT_CONTENT}, #{EVENT_DATE}, #{EVENT_THUMBNAIL})
mapper.update: UPDATE EVENT SET EVENT_GUBUN = #{EVENT_GUBUN}, EVENT_TITLE = #{EVENT_TITLE}, EVENT_CONTENT = #{EVENT_CONTENT}, EVENT_DATE = TO_DATE(#{EVENT_DATE}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), EVENT_THUMBNAIL = #{EVENT_THUMBNAIL} WHERE EVENT_NO = #{EVENT_NO}
mapper.select:
WHERE EVENT_STATE = '공개' AND EVENT_DATE <= TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND EVENT_TITLE LIKE '%${keyword}%'
AND EVENT_CONTENT LIKE '%${keyword}%'
SELECT EVENT_NO, EVENT_GUBUN, EVENT_TITLE, EVENT_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(EVENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') EVENT_DATE, EVENT_THUMBNAIL FROM EVENT WHERE EVENT_NO=#{EVENT_NO} AND EVENT_GUBUN='1'
